template.name: ctax
template.value: // CTAX: Branch register_taxonomy( 'branch', array( 'book' ), array( 'label' => '', // labels->name 'labels' => array( 'name' => __( 'Branches', 'sage' ), 'singular_name' => _x( 'Branch', 'Taxonomy singular name', 'sage' ), 'search_items' => __( 'Search Branches', 'sage' ), 'all_items' => __( 'All Branches', 'sage' ), 'view_item ' => __( 'View Branch', 'sage' ), 'parent_item' => __( 'Parent Branch', 'sage' ), 'parent_item_colon' => __( 'Parent Branch:', 'sage' ), 'edit_item' => __( 'Edit Branch', 'sage' ), 'update_item' => __( 'Update Branch', 'sage' ), 'add_new_item' => __( 'Add New Branch', 'sage' ), 'new_item_name' => __( 'New Branch Name', 'sage' ), 'menu_name' => __( 'Branches', 'sage' ), 'separate_items_with_commas' => __( 'Separate Branches with commas', 'sage' ), 'add_or_remove_items' => __( 'Add or remove Branches', 'sage' ), 'choose_from_most_used' => __( 'Choose from the most used Branches', 'sage' ), ), 'description' => __( 'Branch is taxonomy of event.', 'sage' ), 'public' => true, 'publicly_queryable' => null, // depends on public 'show_in_nav_menus' => true, // depends on public 'show_ui' => true, // depends on public 'show_tagcloud' => true, // depends on how_ui 'show_in_rest' => null, // add to REST API 'rest_base' => null, // $taxonomy 'hierarchical' => true, 'update_count_callback' => '', 'rewrite' => true, //'query_var' => $taxonomy, 'capabilities' => array(), 'meta_box_cb' => 'post_categories_meta_box', // WP v.3.8+: post_categories_meta_box, post_tags_meta_box, false 'show_admin_column' => true, '_builtin' => false, ) );

template.name: cpt
template.value: // CPT: Event register_post_type( 'event', array( 'label' => null, // labels->name 'labels' => array( 'name' => __( 'Events', 'sage' ), 'singular_name' => _x( 'Event', 'Post type singular name', 'sage' ), 'add_new' => __( 'Add Event', 'sage' ), 'add_new_item' => __( 'Add New Event', 'sage' ), 'edit_item' => __( 'Edit Event', 'sage' ), 'new_item' => __( 'New Event', 'sage' ), 'view_item' => __( 'View Event', 'sage' ), 'search_items' => __( 'Search Event', 'sage' ), 'not_found' => __( 'Not Found', 'sage' ), 'not_found_in_trash' => __( 'Not Found in Trash', 'sage' ), 'parent_item_colon' => __( 'Parent Event', 'sage' ), 'menu_name' => __( 'Events', 'sage' ), ), 'description' => __( 'The main “product” of the website and something like installation/presentation/exhibition/etc.', 'sage' ), 'public' => true, 'publicly_queryable' => null, // depends on public 'exclude_from_search' => null, // depends on public 'show_ui' => null, // depends on public 'show_in_menu' => true, // show in admin menu 'show_in_admin_bar' => null, // default is 'show_in_menu' 'show_in_nav_menus' => null, // depends on public 'show_in_rest' => null, // add to REST API. WP 4.7+ 'rest_base' => null, // $post_type. WP 4.7+ 'menu_position' => 5, 'menu_icon' => 'dashicons-calendar-alt', // null, 'dashicons-icon-name' //'capability_type' => 'post', // default is 'post' //'capabilities' => 'post', // an array of additional rights for this post type //'map_meta_cap' => null, // Set to true to enable the default special rights handler 'hierarchical' => false, 'supports' => array( 'title', 'thumbnail' ), // 'title','editor','author','thumbnail','excerpt','trackbacks','custom-fields','comments','revisions','page-attributes','post-formats' 'taxonomies' => array( 'branch' ), 'has_archive' => true, 'rewrite' => array( 'slug' => 'evenemang' ), // array( 'slug' => 'slugname' ) 'query_var' => true, ) );
